org.red5.server.scope

Class BroadcastScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.server.scope.BasicScope
      • org.red5.server.scope.BroadcastScope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<org.red5.server.scope.BasicScope>, org.red5.server.api.event.IEventDispatcher, org.red5.server.api.event.IEventHandler, org.red5.server.api.event.IEventListener, org.red5.server.api.event.IEventObservable, org.red5.server.api.ICoreObject, org.red5.server.api.scope.IBasicScope, org.red5.server.api.scope.IBroadcastScope, org.red5.server.messaging.IMessageInput, org.red5.server.messaging.IMessageOutput, org.red5.server.messaging.IPipe, org.red5.server.messaging.IPipeConnectionListener

    public class BroadcastScope
extends org.red5.server.scope.BasicScope
implements org.red5.server.api.scope.IBroadcastScope, org.red5.server.messaging.IPipeConnectionListener
    Scope type for publishing that deals with pipe connection events, like async message listening in JMS

    • Field Summary

        public void addPipeConnectionListener(org.red5.server.messaging.IPipeConnectionListener listener)
